login.subtitle: AI Chat & Advanced Document Search
login.signInPrompt: Sign in to access the ODC knowledge base

history.searchPlaceholder: Search by title or message content...
history.noMatchingResults: No sessions match your search criteria.
history.noHistory: No chat history yet. Start a conversation in Chat!
history.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected session(s)? This action cannot be undone.
history.deleteAllMessage: Are you sure you want to delete ALL chat sessions? This will permanently remove all your chat history and cannot be undone.

iframe.connectionFailedDesc: Unable to connect to the service. Please check your network connection and try again.
iframe.connectionTimeout: Connection timeout. The service is taking too long to respond.
iframe.networkError: Unable to connect to the service. Please check your network connection.
iframe.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while checking the service availability.
iframe.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to access this resource. Please contact your administrator.
iframe.pageNotFoundDesc: The requested page could not be found. The service may have been moved or is temporarily unavailable.
iframe.serverErrorDesc: The service is experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later.
iframe.errorLoadingDesc: An unknown error occurred while loading the content.
iframe.failedToLoad: Failed to load the content. The service may be temporarily unavailable.

aiChat.title: Chat
aiChat.description: Chat with AI assistant powered by your knowledge base

aiSearch.title: Search
aiSearch.description: Search through your knowledge base with AI

tokenizer.title: Tokenizer
tokenizer.description: Calculate token counts for OpenAI, Ollama, and vLLM models
tokenizer.placeholder: Enter text here to see token count...

minio.title: Knowledge Base Documents
minio.selectBucketPrompt: Please select a bucket from the top right to view files.
minio.name: Name
minio.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Stores user-uploaded profile images and documents
minio.bucketNameHelper: Select an existing bucket from MinIO server
minio.descriptionHelper: Purpose of this bucket for easy management
minio.bucketNameInvalid: Must be 3-63 characters, lowercase, alphanumeric, hyphens, and dots only
minio.deleteBucketConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this bucket configuration? (The bucket will remain in MinIO)
minio.reauthRequired: Security check failed. Please sign in again to delete selected items.

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.adminDescription: Full access to all features and settings
userManagement.managerDescription: Can manage content and view reports
userManagement.userDescription: Standard access to chat and search
userManagement.noPermission: You do not have permission to view this page.

systemTools.title: System Monitoring Tools
systemTools.description: Quick access to system monitoring and management tools. Click on any tool to open it in a new tab.
systemTools.noToolsDescription: No system monitoring tools have been configured yet. Contact your administrator to add tools.

errorPage.accessDeniedMessage: You don't have permission to access this page.
errorPage.pageNotFoundMessage: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
errorPage.serviceUnavailableMessage: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errorPage.internalServerErrorMessage: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

auditLog.title: Audit Logs
auditLog.description: View all system audit logs and user activities
auditLog.searchPlaceholder: Search by user email or details...
auditLog.noPermission: You do not have permission to view audit logs.
